## ARIAGlobalStatesAndProperties.ariaHaspopup property

Indicates the availability and type of interactive popup element, such as menu or dialog, that can be triggered by an element.

[https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/\#aria-haspopup](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#aria-haspopup)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ariaHaspopup: "false" | "true" | "menu" | "listbox" | "tree" | "grid" | "dialog" | string | null;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: aria-haspopup
